Room.Name: Marina/Eidenhoft Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Marina Alley, which winds east to west. Several shops are here.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side of the alley you see a narrow stairwell going to the second floor of a dilapidated building. A sign hangs over the door, and it appears this is the meeting place for a group of hobbits who like to practice low-level magic. Handwritten on the wall is, "Frodo Lives." A storefront church is slightly to the west, and the alley twists out of sight to the east. Directly south is a post office branch.
